name: Nyctophobia (itch) (bsmithfagan)
description:
WASD movement

Mouse controls turning

Shift/Q/E -- choose light source

left click -- toggle light source on/off

Space -- throws torch

Esc -- pause/view controls

Brendan Smith-Fagan

Buzz Tilford
